channel.title: My new minigame (not a c&p!) (help!) {LOADS OF PICTURES =D }
channel.description:
Hello. I have recently introduced the newest items into my server and I was stuck for a way on how people could get them [i]fairly[/i] (bearing in mind its just me on my own, no backups, no "development team" ...) I came up with that Mgrobours wood place with monsters inside it, and when you kill the monsters they drop tokens , which can be exchanged for rewards... and I want to add that the actual wood is a pk place, but when you die you appear back outside the broken railing.... I will add full monster emotes dieing, falling, punching.... I need your ideas people YOUR ideas.
[b]I will add more pictures as this progresses, problem is- nobody plays tobiasscape anymore ;)[/b] Picture: [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/mcgroubors%20wood%20plan.bmp[/img]
Yellow = monsters Brown = A fence to stop you running away to seers - because seers isnt in my server, yet. Red Box = A crate to exchange tokens for rewards
[b]30/10/07:[/b] Done a lot of work on her today, added a thing where you dig behind the front gate of the wood and the ground falls through and your teleported to the moles lair, added a row of bank booths instead of barriers, made the hole in the fence work and made the mole drop stuff. Also the bit before you enter is a safezone, when you enter its pk. But when you die you keep items! (thanks very much you know who you are :) need to add cyclopes and dustdevils and such to the actual wood...
Picture: [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/mcgroubors%20wood%20plan2.bmp[/img] [b]Brown Box:[/b] dig here to be teleported to the moles lair [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/mcgroubors%20wood%20plan3.bmp[/img] [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/mcgroubors%20wood%20plan4.bmp[/img] [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/mcgroubors%20wood%20plan5.bmp[/img] ^^^[b]Mole's lair[/b]^^^
I need your ideas, post code samples etc.
altogether this update should have: -2 object cases ([s]crate[/s], railing) -10 npcs

item.title: My new minigame (not a c&p!) (help!) {LOADS OF PICTURES =D }
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

whats bloods? oh ectos… because they lag server some reason
and whats wrong with that:

	public boolean ApplyDead() {
		if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
 			actionAmount++;
			actionTimer = 0;
			ResetAttack();
			ResetAttackNPC();
 			pEmote = 2820;
			IsDeadTimer = true;
                        ApplyDead();
		}
		if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && !(absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686  && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
                        keepItem1();
                        keepItem2();
                        keepItem3();
                        deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
                        deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
                        deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
			youdied();
                        PKz();
                        teleportToX = 3254;
			teleportToY = 3420;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;
                        if(keepItem != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                        if(keepItem2 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                        if(keepItem3 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                        resetKeepItem(); 
		}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686  && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
                        pEmote = 2304;
			teleportToX = 2658;
			teleportToY = 3499;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        sendMessage("You died in McGroubor's wood, but keep your items...");
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;

                        
		}
		return true;
	}

I havent tested , but could you paste your applydead?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2007, 04:48:55 AM[/size][hr]I just wanna say [color=red]IT WORKS!!![/COLOR]

Read full topic

item.title: My new minigame (not a c&p!) (help!) {LOADS OF PICTURES =D }
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:20, topic:155453”][code]
public boolean ApplyDead() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 0;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
pEmote = 2820;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDead();
}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && !(absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686 && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
PKz();
teleportToX = 3254;
teleportToY = 3420;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem(); 
	}

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686 && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
pEmote = 2304;
teleportToX = 2658;
teleportToY = 3499;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
sendMessage(“You died in McGroubor’s wood, but keep your items…”);
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;

	}
	return true;
}

[/code]

fixed it for you :)[/quote]
Yet, it still sucks.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

	public boolean ApplyDead() {
		if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
 			actionAmount++;
			actionTimer = 0;
			ResetAttack();
			ResetAttackNPC();
 			pEmote = 2820;
			IsDeadTimer = true;
                        ApplyDead();
		}
		if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && !(absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686  && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
                        keepItem1();
                        keepItem2();
                        keepItem3();
                        deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
                        deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
                        deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
			youdied();
                        PKz();
                        teleportToX = 3254;
			teleportToY = 3420;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;
                        if(keepItem != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                        if(keepItem2 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                        if(keepItem3 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                        resetKeepItem(); 
		}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686  && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
                        pEmote = 2304;
			teleportToX = 2658;
			teleportToY = 3499;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        sendMessage("You died in McGroubor's wood, but keep your items...");
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;

                        
		}
		return true;
	}

fixed it for you

item.title: My new minigame (not a c&p!) (help!) {LOADS OF PICTURES =D }
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

ok this my whole applydead please look:

	public boolean ApplyDead() {
		if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
			actionAmount++;
			actionTimer = 0;
			ResetAttack();
			ResetAttackNPC();
			pEmote = 2820;
			IsDeadTimer = true;
                        ApplyDead();
		}
		if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
                        keepItem1();
                        keepItem2();
                        keepItem3();
                        deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
                        deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
                        deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
			youdied();
                        PKz();
                        teleportToX = 3254;
			teleportToY = 3420;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;
                        if(keepItem != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                        if(keepItem2 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                        if(keepItem3 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                        resetKeepItem(); 
		}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 2620 && absX <=2686  && absY >= 3464 && absY <=3508)) {
 youdied();
			keepItem1();
                        keepItem2();
                        keepItem3();

                        pEmote = 2304;
			teleportToX = 2658;
			teleportToY = 3499;
			IsDeadTeleporting = true;
			frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
sendMessage("You died in McGroubor's wood, but keep your items...");
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                        if(keepItem2 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                        if(keepItem3 != 0)
                        addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                        resetKeepItem();

                        
		}
		return true;
	}
